title: Personal Portfolio for Remote Sensing
text:
Hi!
I am Yifei Lin frome Guangzhou, China.
Now I am a Master student in UCL, studying Urban Spatial Science in Centre for Advanced Spatial Analysis. I majored in Urban Planning at Sun Yat-sen University at undergraduate level, which is a five-year subject.
In CASA, I would like to learn advanced spatial analysis and dynamic modelling methods, and study how to apply those technology into practical planning project or city policy.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.
